name: birthdayweekly
description: A little app to remind you about birthdays.

scripts.build: npm run tsc && gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/birthday-weekly/birthday-weekly
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:api && npm run deploy:scheduled
scripts.deploy:api: gcloud run deploy birthday-weekly --image gcr.io/birthday-weekly/birthday-weekly --platform managed
scripts.deploy:scheduled: gcloud run deploy birthday-weekly-scheduled --image gcr.io/birthday-weekly/birthday-weekly --platform managed
